sense.def:
A process
je niz dejanj ali dogodkov, ki imajo določen izid.

seg.quote: It has been a long process getting this information.

sense.def:
Kadar surovine ali živila
are processed
, jih obdelajo v kemičnem ali industrijskem postopku.

To process information
pomeni razčleniti podatke.

seg.quote: Ten computers are processing the data.
Your application will take a few weeks to process.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
is in the process of doing something
, nekaj dela.

seg.quote: She is still in the painful process of growing up.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
in the process
uvedemo opis nečesa, kar naredimo ob tem, ko delamo nekaj drugega, in kot rezultat tistega.

seg.quote: I got him out, but overbalanced in the process and fell.
